name: zebraGET
description:
See full list of options and documentation [here](https://www.api2pdf.com/documentation/advanced-options-zxing-zebra-crossing-barcodes/)
### Authorize via Query String Parameter
**apikey=YOUR-API-KEY**
### Example
``` https://v2018.api2pdf.com/zebra?format={format}&apikey={YourApiKey}&value={YourText} ```

format.description: Most common is CODE_39 or QR_CODE

value.description: Specify the text value you want to convert

showlabel.description: Show label of text below barcode

height.description: Height of the barcode generated image

width.description: Width of the barcode generated image
